page.title: 18SNECKYEAT FARM.
page.content: The owners of Sneckyeat Farm are Mr and Mrs Gate.The Gates bought the farm in 1964 then they started to breed pigs,sheep and cattle.All the crops which they grow are for animal fodder e.g. hay & barley.They have a lot of fields around the farm and twenty fields down at Mirehouse that they rent from another farmer. Their stock mainly consists of cattle.The cattle that they own are twenty-five beef cattle,one Hereford Bull,twelve dry cows,thirty-five stirks and nine Friesian calfs.The milk that comes off the cows is cooled and sent to Distington Creamery ,where it is bottled and sold.The pigs that the Gates have are mainly fat pigs which are bought & sold at Cockermouth & Carlisle Auctions.A licence is needed to transport pigs.
